references.reason: This book provides a comprehensive overview of Bayesian Optimization, the core methodology of the paper.

references.paper_title: Taking the human out of the loop: A review of Bayesian optimization
references.reason: This review paper provides a broad context for the field of Bayesian optimization and its applications.
This book is a foundational text on Gaussian Processes, which are crucial to the surrogate model used in the paper.

references.paper_title: Bayesian kernelized matrix factorization for spatiotemporal traffic data imputation and kriging
references.reason: This paper introduces the Bayesian Kernelized Tensor Factorization (BKTF) model, which forms the basis for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Bayesian complementary kernelized learning for multidimensional spatiotemporal data
references.reason: This paper further develops the BKTF model and its applications, providing key insights for the current research.
